p: It is interesting to note that the models L, U and h that satisfy the criteria in terms of seasonal and annual mean as well as significant negative trend in the historical simulation of CIM rainfall project weak or significant negative trend for the period 2006–2030 ( Table 2). In contrast, the three simulations (s) with low annual and seasonal mean (but with significant negative trend in the historical simulation of CIM rainfall) project high and positive trend for 2006–2030 for most scenarios ( Table 2).
